title: Personal Website
description: Custom implementation for a personal website, leveraging client-side scripting from HTML templates using JavaScript. It supports LaTeX and JSON for managing diverse data.

title: HTTP Server in C++
description: An HTTP server implemented in C++. This project demonstrates the use of multi-threading and HTTP protocol handling, providing a basic yet functional web server capable of handling multiple client requests concurrently.

title: DNS Resolver in C++
description: A DNS resolver implemented in C++. This project focuses on resolving domain names to IP addresses using the DNS protocol, showcasing the implementation of DNS query and response handling.

title: Compiler
description: Compiler for a toy language. It features a custom scanner/parser implemented from scratch in C++, along with semantic analysis. The project utilizes LLVM for in-memory translation during code generation and runtime execution.
